Detailed Description

Pie Chart example: http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=p3&chd=s:Uf9a&chs=250x100&chl=January|February|March|April

Property Documentation

- (float) angle [read, write, assign]

Angle to rotate the chart in radians

- (TPChartTypePie) type [read, write, assign]

Type of the Chart 2D = P 3D = p3 Centric = C
